alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Talbot; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:42PM EDT until August 03 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Muscogee County in west central Georgia... Talbot County in west central Georgia... Northern Taylor County in west central Georgia... Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Big Lazer Creek Wma to River View, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Hamilton, Talbotton, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Junction City, Geneva, North Fort Moore, Bibb City, Upatoi, Shiloh, Green Island Hills, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Howard, Mountain Hill, Benning Hills, Benning Park, Big Lazer Creek Wma, and Bartletts Ferry Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
